From Chamrousse(Isère) to Bessans (Savoie) via Val DArly, the Lekkarod is an event counting for the IFSS World Cup (International Federation of Sleddog Sports).

programme.title: Nepal - The Other Side of Things
programme.desc: A unique spiritual voyage among the giant Himalayan mountains of Everest and Annapurna along ancient paths and across rivers, capturing the local beliefs to discover the marvels of an ancient mountain people in order to understand the meaning of self.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd1 Baqueira Beret Spain
programme.desc: The 2023 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in its 16th season – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! The first stop of the tour takes place in Baqueira Beret who plays again host, following the success of last year’s inaugural event at this epic venue. Consistent snowfall and varied terrain make this world-class resort an ideal test for freeride fanatics.The judging criteria at the Freeride World Tour are: Difficulty of Line, Control, Fluidity, Jumps & Technique.

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2024 #2
programme.desc: La Pierra Menta est devenue au fil des 37 éditions, la compétition de ski-alpinisme de référence, un passage obligé pour l’élite de la discipline. Elle rassemble tous les ans plus de 200 cordées de 2 skieurs. Coup double pour les équipes masculines et féminines françaises qui lemportent dans cette deuxième étape et prennent la tête du classement général à la mi-course

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2024 #1
programme.desc: La Pierra Menta est devenue au fil des 37 éditions, la compétition de ski-alpinisme de référence, un passage obligé pour l’élite de la discipline. Elle rassemble tous les ans plus de 200 cordées de 2 skieurs. Les français brillent lors de cette première étape de la Pierra Menta Axelle Gachet-Mollaret et Emily Harrop entête, William Bonmardion et Xavier Gachet à laffût. des résultats prometteurs pour la suite de la compétition

programme.title: The First Second - Vivian Bruchez
programme.desc: Ses yeux ne quittent jamais la montagne… Du premier coup d’oeil sur une face à la vision exigeante qui englobera tout, Vivian Bruchez avance comme un explorateur. Sa pratique de la pente raide est une marche vers l’inconnu, aussi enthousiaste que méthodique , une quête minutieuse du moindre détail, un parcours vers l‘accord avec lui-même.Vivian Bruchez - The Steep search. His eyes never leave the mountain ... From the first glance at a demanding vision that will encompass everything, Vivian Bruchez moves forward like an explorer. His practice of the steep slope is a march towards the unknown, as enthusiastic as it is methodical, a meticulous quest for the smallest detail, a journey towards agreement with himself.

programme.title: La Grande Odyssée 2022
programme.desc: La Grande Odyssée Savoie Mont Blanc est, depuis sa première édition en janvier 2005, l’événement annuel du chien de traîneau en Europe. C’est la course à étapes la plus exigeante dans un décor alpin unique au monde. Découvrez un plateau sportif d’exception avec 68 mushers et leurs 600 chiens-athlètes venant de grandes nations du mushing européen (France, Suède, Suisse, Espagne, Allemagne, Italie et Pologne). Ce sont plus de 50 000 spectateurs qui vivent chaque année une expérience unique, au coeur de 20 stations, villes et villages, de Savoie Mont Blanc en habits de fête pour l’occasion, en assistant à La Grande Odyssée Savoie Mont Blanc.La Grande Odyssee Savoie Mont Blanc is since it’s first edition in January 2005, the annual event of the dog sled race in Europe. It is the most demanding stage race in a unique alpine setting in the world. Each year it brings together more than 60 mushers and their 600 dogs, from all over Europe, in the stunning landscapes of Savoie Mont Blanc. It is more than 50 000 spectators who live every year a unique experience, in 20 stations decorated for the occasion, by attending La Grande Odyssee Savoie Mont Blanc.

programme.title: Alone And Without A Guide On Mexico's Third Highest Mountain-Iztaccihuatl (Eng)
programme.desc: Being alone and without a guide in a summit attempt for the third highest mountain in Mexico was a dream. The climb is amazing. The ridge to Iztaccihuatls summit feels endless, but the views of the surrounding valleys and Popocatepetl make the effort worth it.

programme.title: The First Second - Sam Anthamatten I
programme.desc: A specialist in high mountains, Sam is a committed freerider, but behind his instinct to ski, there is a guide: it is his job, his culture. At each line, an internal struggle begins between security and risk-taking ... The balance is difficult, with great freedom involved. Through his practice, he lives and perpetuates a mythical image, that of the Zermatt guide.

programme.title: Nightmare Climbs - Jafferau (Eng)
programme.desc: Patrick Martini and his special guests are ready to climb a new, very tough peak: it is the ascent of Jafferau, in Bardonecchia, where Chris Froome won a legendary Pink Jersey in 2018.

programme.title: Engadin Ski Marathon 2023
programme.desc: On Sunday, March 12, 2023, more than 14,000 athletes competed in the 53rd edition of the Engadin Skimarathon, the second largest cross-country skiing event in the world and the largest cross-country skiing event in Switzerland. Among the large crowd of participants are also world-class runners. What awaits them on this day in the high valley are 42 strenuous kilometers over frozen lakes, past typical Engadine villages and through a picturesque Swiss Alpine landscape. The best completed the course in a time of around 1.5 hours.

programme.title: World Rookie Snowboard Finals 2024
programme.desc: The World Rookie Snowboard Finals are an iconic event in the world of youth snowboarding, where emerging athletes have the chance to test themselves and compete against the best in their category becoming a star! The Finals are back in style at the historic location of Kitzsteinhorn Zell am See-Kaprun, for a six-day contest and non-stop activities, providing an exceptional setting and unparalleled snow conditions for this high-level competition. This prestigious event determines the new 2024 World Rookie Champions title for Snowboard Halfpipe and Slopestyle, who earn the opportunity to participate in renowned international competitions and training camps in 2024.

programme.title: Adamello Ultra Trail 2023 - 100 km
programme.desc: The Adamello Trail is a race of 100 km of length and 6.050m of positive difference in altitude, to run in self-sufficiency, organized by the Adamello Ultratrail ASD in cooperation with the Unione dei comuni Alta Valle Camonica. The maximum time allowed to finish the race is 31 hours.

programme.title: The First Second - Laetitia Roux E
programme.desc: Championne française la plus titrée de tous les temps, Laetitia Roux a une capacité quasi-irréelle à aller au bout de la difficulté, dans un des sports les plus durs qui soient… . Son entraînement, omniprésent, reste une école permanente de vie. Son esprit de compétition naturel s’oriente de plus en plus vers l’équipe et le partage. Avec le ski-alpinisme, elle voit le monde comme elle l’aime : élevé, lumineux, rapide. Elle est dans le plaisir.

programme.title: Inside UTMB 2022
programme.desc: UTMB is considered the super bowl of trail running, and with over 10,000 metres of elevation gain, its widely considered to also be one of the most difficult races in the world. This year, Audrée and Jeff would both have the chance to toe the starting line, and this film will show you both of their perspectives with an intimate look at this incredible event.

programme.title: Ungrounded Episode 3 - Meredith Edwards
programme.desc: Meredith Edwards is an elite-level mountain ultra runner, with podium finishes at the Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc TDS race, the Javelina Jundred 100K and the Flagstaff Skyrace 55K. She is also a member of the U.S. Ski Mountaineering Team. In Episode 3, she reveals how in 2019 she fought an inner struggle with her body that almost resulted in a full blood transfusion-and came back from it to win one of the world’s most challenging Ultra Marathons. (English version with French, German, Italian and Spanish subtitles available)

programme.title: Golden Trail Series - Chasing Dreams Season 2022 - Episode 2 A new life (Eng)
programme.desc: From zero-to-hero, this is what happened to rookie Sara Alonso after the first race of the season. See her life change as she rises through the ranks to chase her dream of being amongst the world’s best. Japan’s most famous trail runner, Ruy Ueda, after having a bad start to the season, will try to adjust his racing strategy to get some points at the Mont-Blanc Marathon. Will it work?

programme.title: Golden Trail Series - Chasing Dreams 2023 - Ep 6 The Final - Part 1 (Eng)
programme.desc: The Golden Trail Series grand final unfolds in Italy with a high-speed 8km prologue on day one. Athletes sprint solo, but Rémi Bonnets decisions might risk his entire season. Meanwhile, the intense rivalry between Sophia and Judith on the womens side is on the brink.

programme.title: Super League Triathlon Arena Games 2023 Sursee part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sursee Switzerland for the second race of the 2023 Arena Games Triathlon powered by Zwift and the first journey into Europe for the year. Super League Triathlon which is partnered with World Triathlon brings you the second ever Arena Games Triathlon World Championships, with a champion to be crowned at the final in London after the first two races of the series in Montreal and Sursee.

programme.title: Racing Georgia - Ep 7 (Eng)
programme.desc: Athletes are on the final stage of a 7-day stage race in the country of Georgia with Racing the Planet as they take their final steps to the cave city of Varzdia after running 250 km while carrying all of their food and supplies for the week on their backs.

programme.title: Olympus Marathon 2022 (Eng)
programme.desc: The Olympus Marathon has firmly established itself among the trail running community and it’s 18 years that it’s grown into the epic event it is. In 2022 runners from 25 countries arrived in Greece ready to test themselves in the mountain that is branded a National Park.

programme.title: World Triathlon Para Series 2023
programme.desc: Following its successful debut last year, the World Triathlon Para Series returns to Swansea and a chance for the worlds most decorated para triathletes to put on a show. Among the stars here is Jetze Plat from the Netherlands, unbeaten since 2016, World and Paralympic champion Spain’s Susana Rodriguez, Martin Schultz, the champion in Rio, and Tokyo Alexis Hanquinquant the giant from France, Grace Norman from the United States and from England, the World and Commonwealth champion Dave Ellis.

programme.title: Golden Trail World Series 2023 - Dolomyths Run (Eng)
programme.desc: After the first two exceptional legs, the Golden Trail World Series heads to Canazei, Italy and the thrilling DoloMyths Run. For its 25th anniversary the Italian classic is the 3rd leg of the GTWS 2023. Whos gonna survive to the Couloir of Hell? The race is the most technical one of the GTWS so here we will see all the runners that are specialists in technicall terrain and downhills. It is the last chance for them to score big points before the final.

programme.title: Expedition Canada Season 2 Ep 1 (Eng)
programme.desc: Connecting remote wilderness areas throughout the Okanagan backcountry to string together another world class expedition race is what these ladies, Nathalie Long of Kelowna and Lyndie Hill live for, so long as neither of them get lost in the process. Episode 1 : Finding the Start. Nathalie Long and Lyndie are at it again trying to link up 5 remote areas in the Okanagan backwoods to string together another world class race and not lose anyone in the process.

programme.title: Nepal - The Other Side of Things
programme.desc: A unique spiritual voyage among the giant Himalayan mountains of Everest and Annapurna along ancient paths and across rivers, capturing the local beliefs to discover the marvels of an ancient mountain people in order to understand the meaning of self.

programme.title: Road To One Water Race Ep3 - Swimming
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 7 mixed teams of 7 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness. Road to One Water Race Ep3 describes what is involved in swimming 50 km during the day and during the night in between Islands..

programme.title: Twenty-one Twelve
programme.desc: Katie Visco challenges herself to complete a first ever bike supported 2,112 mile run across Australia and documents all the fun and grueling moments in a first release of Twenty One Twelve. The epic adventure starts in Darwin and ends in Adelaide, 119 days later……

programme.title: Rwanda Congo Uganda Bike Adventure - Part 4
programme.desc: Our friend, bikepacker and adventurer, Michele continues his epic 800km solo African bike packing adventure in Rwanda, through Congo and finishing in Uganda. Part 4 of 4 - The final stage : from Rwanda to Uganda. Michele makes a stop at Lake Mutanda and then visits Queen Elisabeth National Park. Lots of wildlife watching (birds, elephants, buffalos, monkeys, antilopes, hippos, crocodiles...)

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 5
programme.desc: We start our episode from Spain and a renowned Triathlon event in Portocolom, Mallorca. We then stay in Mallorca and we will now follow a cycling one. The 13th edition of the Mallorca 312 OK Mobility. We then leave Mallorca, but stay in Spain for another cycling event, the 13th edition of the Andalucia Bike Race. Then time to move to the new sport’s concept, that bridges the gap between traditional endurance and functional fitness and combines running with well-known gym exercises in a standardized format. Later on we follow the UltraSwim 33.3 event which has the iconic challenge of the English Channel as its inspiration and the event will test swimmers in the equivalent distance of 33.3km, spread over four days and six swims.

programme.title: The Best Hike In Switzerland - Zermatt to Mettelhorn (Eng)
programme.desc: Mettelhorn and Platthorn are hidden gems as a one-day out-and-back hiking/mountaineering trip from Zermatt. Its a good route to help acclimatise to bigger mountains in the area. The route starts from the northern outskirts of Zermatt, Switzerlands picturesque ski resort town, taking paths that zig-zag up the mountain and take you to some stunning Alpine views of famous mountains like the Matterhorn, Zinalrothorn, and Weisshorn. The journey to Mettelhorn was a unique Alpine experience that doesnt pack the same effort punch that lies in most Mountaineering routes while still delivering spectacular mountain views

programme.title: Raid Temiscamingue (Eng)
programme.desc: 24 enthusiasts, 12 families, 1 winning team. The challenge is real, and they are all ready for blood, sweat and tears. The very first RAID Temiscamingue has arrived in one of the most beautiful areas of Canada. Surrounded by mountains, majestic lakes, rivers and luxurious forest, 12 teams will race against the clock in this wild adventure where they’ll have to upscale their skills in paddling, swimming, hiking and biking. They will have to overcome their fear of ziplines and find their way to the finish line through self-orientation with a map. Who is the most adventurous family in the province of Quebec? This is what it is all about.

programme.title: Georgia on my bike - Part 1 (Eng)
programme.desc: Il primo episodio del favoloso giro in bicicletta di Mike Sanna attraverso le montagne del Caucasus in Georgia, a partire dallantica chiesa della Trinità nel nord del paese a Gergeti e attraverso Kazbegi, dirigendosi a sud attraverso il selvaggio e bellissimo entroterra georgianoThe first episode of Mike Sannas fabulous bike packing ride through the Caucasus mountains of Georgia starting with the ancient church of the Trinity in the north of the country in Gergeti, and through Kazbegi, heading south through the wild and beautiful Georgian outback

programme.title: Malawi Bike Tour Part 3
programme.desc: Il nostro amico bikepacker e avventuriero Michele è in viaggio di 4 settimane e 1400 km attraverso la savana, le montagne e le foreste del Malawi. Fantastica avventura africana, paesaggi meravigliosi, grandi incontri umani, fauna selvatica. Parte 3 di Liwonde N.P. a Blantyre.Our friend bikepacker and adventurer Michele is on a 4 weeks and 1400 km bike trip through savanna, mountains and forests in Malawi. Fantastic African adventure, gorgeous scenery, great human encounters, wildlife. Part 3 from Liwonde N.P. to Blantyre.

programme.title: A Feather in the West
programme.desc: In September 2019, a team of talented Irish climbers [Chloe Condron, Kevin Kilroy, Michelle OLoughlin and Conor McGovern] travelled to the small island of Owey to explore sea cliffs that local guidebook writer Iain Miller claims, have “enough new routing potential to last at least twelve lifetimes”. ‘A Feather in the West’ is a film about their trad climbing experiences and the relatively niche pursuit of first ascents, set on the Wild Atlantic Way, off the west coast of County Donegal. (Special thanks to Pertex)

programme.title: Ungrounded Episode 4 - Sunny Stroeer
programme.desc: Two weeks after paying off her student loans, Sunny Stroeer left her job as a strategy consultant, moved into her astro van, and began running and climbing full time. Since then, she has gone to break records and climb summits no woman has done before. In Episode 4 of Ungrounded, Stroeer shares how she pushed herself to tackle some of the world’s highest peaks.(English version with French, German, Italian and Spanish subtitles available)

programme.title: Rwanda Congo Uganda Bike Adventure - Part 3
programme.desc: Our friend, bikepacker and adventurer, Michele continues his epic 800km solo African bike packing adventure in Rwanda, through Congo and finishing in Uganda. Part 3 of 4 - Republic Democratic of Congo : Gorillas and Volcanoes. Michele left his bicycle for a few days to go to Congo to visit the Virunga National Park. Here he could see the famous mountain gorillas and get to the top of Nyiragongo Volcano (3740m) where he spend the night to admire the lava lake. he also had to be careful and avoid the Ebola pandemia.

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 10
programme.desc: In this episode, we dive headfirst into the waters of Europe and Spain, where the final ICF Canoe Slalom and Kayak Cross World Cup unfolded in La Seu. Next, we embark on an epic journey to Andorra for the DynaFit Andorra SkiMo, a long-distance ski mountaineering experience that has become a must-not-miss event. This 70km route connects ten mountain refuges, providing an unforgettable adventure. Our quest for thrills takes us across continents and landscapes as we explore World Trail Races, a platform dedicated to promoting mountain culture throughout Brazil. Here, trail running and mountain biking enthusiasts answer the call of the mountains. The FEI, the International Federation for Equestrian Sports, showcases elite athletes competing in renowned competitions worldwide. Athletes from around the globe are tested to their limits in the world of equestrian sports. The 31st FISU Summer World University Games, held in Chengdu, delivered thrilling spectacles across various sports. But the excitement doesnt stop there. We infuse our show with the high-energy spirit of HYROX, where we witness the evolution of this exciting concept and get to enjoy elite competitors in action.

programme.title: Marathon Des Sables 2023 #2
programme.desc: Marathon Des Sables 2023 Day 2. 1,054 competitors embarked on the day’s 31.7 K course, which includes the magnificent, yet demanding, sandy climb of the EL OTFAL djebel. The stage took place under a scorching heat. On the MDS, the second stage is always crucial: it’s make-or-break !Marathon Des Sables 2023 Jour 2. 1054 concurrents se sont élancés sur les 31,7 km du jour, incluant la magnifique et terrible ascension sablonneuse du djebel EL OTFAL. Le parcours s’est effectué sous une chaleur écrasante. Sur le MDS, la deuxième étape est toujours cruciale : ça passe ou ça casse.

programme.title: Malawi Bike Tour Part 2
programme.desc: Il nostro amico bikepacker e avventuriero Michele è in viaggio di 4 settimane e 1400 km attraverso la savana, le montagne e le foreste del Malawi. Fantastica avventura africana, paesaggi meravigliosi, grandi incontri umani, fauna selvatica. Parte 1 in bicicletta lungo la costa del lago Malawi.Our friend bikepacker and adventurer Michele is on a 4 weeks and 1400 km bike trip through savanna, mountains and forests in Malawi. Fantastic African adventure, gorgeous scenery, great human encounters, wildlife. Part 1 cycling the lake Malawi coastline.

programme.title: Road To One Water Race Ep2 - The Athletes
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 7 mixed teams of 7 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness. Road to One Water Race Ep2 presents the athletes, their motivation and fears.

programme.title: The First Second - Armel Le Cléac'h (VF)
programme.desc: Armel Le Cléac’h construit ses victoires grâce à une relation forte avec toute l’équipe dont il se sent le prolongement… Mais pour ce navigateur engagé dans une lutte dantesque avec l’océan sur un trimaran géant de 32 mètres, chaque trajectoire vers un nouveau départ est une nouvelle confrontation avec l’imprévu, avec sa propre volonté et avec son premier adversaire : lui-même.

programme.title: Road To One Water Race Ep4 - Running
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 7 mixed teams of 7 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness. Road to One Water Race Ep4 describes how tough the running will is through very difficult terrains.

programme.title: ÖTILLÖ Swimrun Engadin 2023
programme.desc: Slightly overcast but warm conditions made for an ideal race day in the beautiful Engadin valley. 450 athletes from 37 nations participated in the three race distances World Series, Sprint and Experience. 70 teams and 45 solo athletes competed in the World Series race, which covered a total distance of 43.4 km up and down the Upper Engadin with start and finish in Silvaplana. The racers had to master 37.5 km of partly very technical trail running and 5.9 km of swimming across 9 swim sections in Lake Silvaplana, Lake Champfèr and Lake Sils.Des conditions légèrement couvertes mais chaudes ont fait une journée de course idéale dans la belle vallée de lEngadine. 450 athlètes de 37 nations ont participé aux trois distances de course World Series, Sprint et Experience. 70 équipes et 45 athlètes en solo ont participé à la course des World Series, qui a parcouru une distance totale de 43,4 km dans la Haute-Engadine avec départ et arrivée à Silvaplana. Les coureurs devaient maîtriser 37,5 km de trail en partie très technique et 5,9 km de natation sur 9 sections de natation dans le lac de Silvaplana, le lac de Champfèr et le lac de Sils.

programme.title: Muscat Classic 2024
programme.desc: The Muscat Classic is a cycling race which takes place as a prelude to the Tour Of Oman on a difficult 174 kilometer route between Al Mouj Muscat and Al Bustan with 6 climbs totaling 2,000 meters of D+.

programme.title: Cro Race 2023 Stage 4
programme.desc: Cro Race 2023 Stage 4 : KRK - LABIN

programme.title: Tour de France Prudential Singapore Criterium
programme.desc: The Tour de France Prudential Singapore Criterium race weekend includes races for both professionals and amateurs. The two-day programme culminates with the criterium race featuring 28 top international riders (Marc Cavendish, Tadej Pogacar, Peter Sagan ...) from 7 of the worlds best professional cycling teams (UAE Emirates, Cofidis, Bahrain Victorious ...)

programme.title: From The South Up - The Film
programme.desc: Brendon Tyree, a photographer and ex elite bicycle racer from Sheffield in the UK is turning one of those old dreams into reality : to ride on his bike the length of South America. His trip starts off at the bottom of the world in Chile’s extreme south, and then ride north through a constantly changing landscape of Glaciers, Deserts and Salt flats followed by the high Andean Mountains and the Amazon Rain Forest before finally finishing up on the Caribbean coast of Colombia.

programme.title: 4Islands 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: 4Islands MTB Croatia, a stage race in the Epic Series (e.g. including the Cape Epic), will welcome over 370 mountain bikers from all over the world for a five-day race on four Croatian islands. This year the order of the islands is slightly different, starting with Krk, Cres, Lošinj and ending the adventure on Rab. The race covers a total of 272 km with 6.210 m of climbing, promising the riders raw beauty and different challenges each day, with some islands offering rugged and barren terrain, while others offer green landscapes.

programme.title: Cycling For Autism (Eng)
programme.desc: Whether it was a need for adventure or to stop a life thats going too fast or to reconnect with the essentials, Adrien did a 6-month cycling tour of Europe in 2022. To make the adventure even more beautiful and intense to experience, it was natural for him to associate it with an important cause, and one that is close to his heart : Autism. Xavier is his 15 year old autistic nephew, and as he loves cycling as much as him, Adrien wanted to help the association “Des Rêves pour Xavier” (Dreams for Xavier) to finance an electric tandem. Adrien’s other goal was to raise autism awareness among as many people as possible.

programme.title: Freewheeling 2023 Ep.2 Strade Bianche (Eng)
programme.desc: Exclusive behind the scenes of the first race of the year - the classic - Strade Bianche 2023 presented by Hannah Walker with a look at mens team Arkea Samsic and womens UAE team ADQ. Hannah discusses the results as well as womens cycling with UAE coach Ruben Bertogliati and with top cyclist Silvia Persico and others.

programme.title: Kite Masters 2023 - Episode 6
programme.desc: Following the exhilarating event in Cagliari, the grand finale of the 2023 KiteFoil World Series unfolded in Zhuhai, China. Drawing top international riders from around the globe, the Lakewood Hills KiteFoil World Series China became the epicenter of anticipation. Riders ventured to Zhuhai, fueled by the prospect of fierce competition in this dynamic venue. Throughout 2023, Kite Masters continued to showcase the epitome of kiteboarding excellence on your TV screens. The sports evolution is evident with each passing year, mirrored by the advancing skills of the riders. In our coverage, we witnessed the next generation of exceptionally talented athletes, capturing the thrilling moments from both the Formula Kite Youth European and World Championships. The action unfolded, reflecting the continuous progression of the sport and the remarkable skills of these emerging kiteboarding talents.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup Cape Verde 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: The legendary waves of Cape Verde are set to be the stage for the opening round of the Wave discipline on the GWA Wingfoil World Tour, kick-starting the 2024 season. Reigning GWA Wave world champions, Cape Verde’s Wesley Brito and the US’s Moona Whyte, are slated to open the defence of the titles they clinched in the ground-breaking discipline’s first year in 2023.

programme.title: Engadinwind 2023
programme.desc: The Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine 2023 gathers the world class of Windsurfer and Wingfoiler competing at the Lake Silvaplana in the Engadine, Switzerland. The event has developed into the worlds most important and largest foil event. Furthermore, it is the place to be for the U21 World Championships in the iQ FOiL windsurfing category, that will be part of the Olympic programme in Paris 2024. Also, 65 windsurfers, kite-surfers and wingfoilers will honor tradition and take part in the 46th edition of the Engadin Surf & Kite marathon on Lake Silvaplana.

programme.title: Kite Masters 2023 Episode 5
programme.desc: Over the years, Poetto Beach has indisputably proven to be a favorite among international riders, offering a stunning backdrop on the south coast of the magnificent Italian island nestled in the Mediterranean. The 2023 KiteFoil World Series second stop witnessed awe-inspiring performances by elite kiteboarders, leaving spectators in awe. As these remarkable athletes gear up for the upcoming years Olympic Games, the anticipation and energy continue to build, promising an unforgettable journey in the world of kiteboarding.

programme.title: Birna. The Woman Who Swims In Ice
programme.desc: Icelandic ice swimmer Birna Hrönn swims in freezing lakes and seas of Iceland and swimming - without the use of a wetsuit - distances that would seem impossible. We follow Birna as she explores new places to swim and recounts her life, her love of the outdoors and her devotion to the sport of ice swimming. With comments by Ram Barkai, Chairman of the International Ice Swimming Association, on the effects of cold water immersion on the human body, the film shows that nothing is impossible.

programme.title: The First Second - Samantha Davies
programme.desc: Samantha Davies sees the ocean as a pleasure, obvious. In symbiosis with her boat, she leads a violent struggle with the harsh conditions and "loves it" in an almost inexplicable way! She knows and enjoys her luck, which she shares with Initiatives Cœur. She also measures it to that of her grandfather, a war submariner…. At the start of a race like the Vendée Globe, it is an adventurer who sets off.

programme.title: GKA Kite World Tour 2023 - Dakhla
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour Kite-Surf riders line-up at one of the kitesurfing world’s most contestable wave riding venues at West Point in Morocco – a host country that has been an ever-present on the world tour calendar for over 15 years.

programme.title: Copa Kitley Qatar Airways GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2023
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour hits Rio de Janeiro in Brazil in 2023 for a Kite-Surf world cup event! The second stop of wave tour to debut in Rio de Janeiro with top athletes slated to battle for glory in renowned break. The tour leaders stamped their claim on the crown in the pure wave surfing contest in the legendary break of Cape Verde’s Ponta Preta. But the swell and wind in Saquarema can vary, with the effect that the contest may feature a mix of pure wave kite-surfing and strapless surfboard tricks, depending on the conditions. Thirty-five of the world’s best kite-surfing athletes—25 men and 10 women—from 14 nations around the globe are slated to battle for the crown in Saquarema. The spot on Saquarema’s Itauna Beach, a World Surf League stop last year, has a 12-day competition window to allow for the best possible conditions.

programme.title: Hugo & Max - The Grand Slam
programme.desc: During the 2022 season of ÖTILLÖ Swimrun the French-Swedish duo Hugo Tormento and Max Andersson set out on the quest to not only win ÖTILLÖ The Swimrun World Championship but to win every single race in the whole World Series. Seven in total.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour Austria 2022
programme.desc: The legendary freestyle windsurfing event on lake Neusiedl is back! Since 1998 the best Freestyle Windsurfers in the world travel down to the Austrian water sports capital to compete in the European Freestyle Pro Tour. This edition, taking place between the 27th of April and the 1st of May, is historical in that for the first time ever Women are competing at the EFPT Surf Opening as well!

programme.title: ÖTILLÖ Swimrun Gothenburg 2023
programme.desc: The Gothenburg Archipelago presented itself at its best for this years ÖTILLÖ Swimrun Gothenburg. The weather conditions were calm and dry with mild air temperatures and a water temperature of around 17 degrees. The race course was very challenging: the athletes had to complete a total race distance of 33.3 km with 26.4 km of very technical trail running and 6.9 km of swimming. 28 running sections and 27 swim sections meant a lot of transitions for the racers. 82 teams and 42 solo racers participated in the World Series distance.

programme.title: The First Second - Armel Le Cléac'h E
programme.desc: Armel Le Cléach creates his victories thanks to a strong relationship with the whole team of which he is the extension ... But for this navigator engaged in a daunting battle with the ocean on a giant 32-meter trimaran, each course towards a new start is a new battle with the unknown, with his own will and with his primary adversary: himself.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup Denmark 2023
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Tour 2023 makes its debut in Denmark with a Surf-Freestyle and FreeFly-Slalom World Cup event. The event is held in Hvide Sande on the North Sea coast, a town in central western Denmark nestled in the dunes of Holmsland. This is the fifth round of competition in both disciplines, with only two stops left to determine the champions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Tour Cabo Verde 2023
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Tour is excited to hit Cape Verde for the first World Cup of the pure Wave discipline. The best wingfoil wave athletes are united at one of the most renowned and best wave locations in the world to showcase the highest level of wingfoil wave performance in this surfing-only event.

programme.title: ÖTILLÖ, The Swimrun World Championship 2023
programme.desc: ÖTILLÖ, The Swimrun World Championship; 60 km trail running and 10 km open water swimming (in pairs) in the wild terrain of the Stockholm archipelago, is considered one of the toughest one-day races in the world.

programme.title: La Grande Odyssée 2023 - Best of
programme.desc: The Grande Odyssée VVF, carrying the fundamental values ​​of those who love the mountains, has been since its first edition in January 2005, an essential event for dog sledding in Europe. For the first time in 19 years, the Grande Odyssée VVF will cover, in addition to Savoie and Haute Savoie, the department of Isère. The 19th edition will be held from January 7 to 19, 2023, with the presence of 66 mushers and their 600 top-level athletic dogs from all over Europe. They will set off for 13 days of racing, 400 km, 12,000 m of elevation gain, 11 stages, and will cross around 20 ski resorts.

programme.title: Open Faces Obertauern 2024
programme.desc: The 4*Freeride World Tour Challenger provides the big stage for the final decisions for qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2025. This international freeride contest is taking place in Obertauern for the first time and offers ideal conditions for this event with numerous freeride options.

programme.title: Climbing Skye's Highest Peak - Sgurr Alasdair
programme.desc: Cris and Viv decided to climb Sgurr Alasdair, the highest mountain on the island of Skye, located in an area of the mountain range known as Black Cullin. The main challenge they had in climbing the peak was the Great Stone Chute. A 300-meter slope of the harshest mountain terrain - scree. The summit of Sgurr Alasdair has unobstructed views of all of the Munroes in the Black Cullin, and also of one of Skyes most famous routes - The Cullin Ridge traverse.

programme.title: Petzl Roc Trip Argentina
programme.desc: Located in the heart of the Patagonian pampas, in Argentinas Chubut province, Piedra Paradas monolith rises up from the surrounding desert. Lying just to the north, the majestic La Buitrera Canyon was home to the Petzl RocTrip. For more than a week, climbers from all over the world came together to share a common passion: climbing. Thanks to the hard work of a team of Argentinean and international route developers, La Buitrera Canyon, 5 km long with towering cliffs up to 200m high, is now one of Argentinas major climbing spots. For the tenth edition of the Petzl RocTrip, more than 1500 people climbed in the wind, dust, heat, and cold, for an unforgettable Patagonian experience!

programme.title: World Rookie Freeski Finals 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 World Rookie Finals Freeski in Madonna di Campiglio, Italy, is where the world’s best young skiers are ready to compete in order to take the titles of World Rookie and Grom Freeski Champions.

programme.title: La Grande Odyssée 2024 - Best Of
programme.desc: The Grande Odyssée VVF has been, since its first edition in January 2005, the annual sled dog event in Europe. It is the most demanding stage race in a unique alpine setting in the world. This year 2024, an exceptional sporting field is brought together with more than 65 international mushers and their 600 very high-level dog-athletes who will compete over nearly 400km and 12,000m of cumulative positive altitude difference, in the superb landscapes of the French region Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes.

programme.title: Margalef - Climbing
programme.desc: Margalef is a little village next to the Monsant river, in Catalunya. The most amazing rocks in Europe and hundreds routes for climbing. Pure fun and climbing in this little entertaining film.

programme.title: The First Second - Sam Anthamatten
programme.desc: A specialist in high mountains, Sam is a committed freerider, but behind his instinct to ski, there is a guide: it is his job, his culture. At each line, an internal struggle begins between security and risk-taking ... The balance is difficult, with great freedom involved. Through his practice, he lives and perpetuates a mythical image, that of the Zermatt guide.

programme.title: Summiting Mt Sneffels in Colorado (Eng)
programme.desc: Mount Sneffels is a prominent mountain near Ouray, Colorado in the United States which is over 14,000 feet high, more than 4,300 metres. Audree had never climbed a 14er, so we decided to try reach its summit while on a road trip through Colorado in late-July.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd3 Kicking Horse Golden BC, Canada
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour continues in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). Known for its champagne powder and long, steep runs, it’s no wonder Kicking Horse attracts riders from all over the globe. The competition takes place on the ever-impressive Ozone Face, offering riders 324 meters of vertical drop and a varied freeride playground of steep terrain, cornices, transfers, and big cliffs. This provides something to suit the different styles of the athletes, who scope out their lines and aim for what could earn a podium finish. In the back of their minds is the cut, which means for many, this would be their last FWT event of the season, and so they have nothing to lose to stay on tour and earn their place in the FWT Finals.

programme.title: Running the Loowit Trail on Mt St Helens
programme.desc: The Loowit Trail circumnavigates Mount St. Helens, past old-growth forests, waterfalls, meadows, and the leftovers of the volcanos 1980 eruption. We ran the roughly 30 mile trail, starting from Climbers Bivouac Campground. (English version with French and Italian subtitles)

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2024 #3
programme.desc: La Pierra Menta est devenue au fil des 37 éditions, la compétition de ski-alpinisme de référence, un passage obligé pour l’élite de la discipline. Elle rassemble tous les ans plus de 200 cordées de 2 skieurs. Tour de force au sommet du grand mont! les équipes masculines et féminines françaises confortent leur première place au classement général de la Pierra Menta au cœur dune troisième étape clé pour la victoire finale

programme.title: Norvan Falls
programme.desc: A group of us pay a visit to one of our favourite local waterfalls, Norvan Falls in North Vancouver, BC. Youll also get a look at how the falls look when frozen mid-winter.

programme.title: The High Pass
programme.desc: Annapurna Circuit trek in central Nepal climbs to an altitude of 5,400m through Thorung La pass, one of the highest trekking passes in the world, below peaks that rise 6000-8000m in elevation from the Annapurna Range. We attempted to complete the trek in about 15 days starting mid-December, when the shoulder season promised much smaller crowds but with it a risk of deep snow that early winter can bring to the Pass. (Subtitles in French, Italian and English)

programme.title: Open Faces 2024
programme.desc: The most important Freeride World Tour Qualifier Series in Europe celebrated the start of the 10th season with the 2* FWT Qualifier competition. In challenging conditions the riders show their skills and offer top-class performances on the Quellspitze in Kappl/Paznaun.

programme.title: Highest Peak on Vancouver's North Shore - BRUNSWICK MOUNTAIN (Eng)
programme.desc: We summit Brunswick Mountain, the highest peak on Vancouvers North Shore, followed by Mt. Harvey right next to it. This video was filmed on the traditional, ancestral and unceded territory of the Coast Salish Peoples - Sḵwx̱wú7mesh (Squamish), Tsleil-Waututh & Musqueam First Nations.

programme.title: Lekkarod 2022 (V. Int)
programme.desc: It is an exceptional line-up of mushers that has an appointment for this seventh edition of the Lekkarod. Coming from France, Germany, Switzerland, Spain and Alaska, 30 teams and 13 participants in the ski-joëring category took part in a total of 9 stages. From Chamrousse(Isère) to Bessans (Savoie) via Val DArly, the Lekkarod is an event counting for the IFSS World Cup (International Federation of Sleddog Sports).

programme.title: Nepal - The Other Side of Things
programme.desc: A unique spiritual voyage among the giant Himalayan mountains of Everest and Annapurna along ancient paths and across rivers, capturing the local beliefs to discover the marvels of an ancient mountain people in order to understand the meaning of self.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd1 Baqueira Beret Spain
programme.desc: The 2023 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in its 16th season – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! The first stop of the tour takes place in Baqueira Beret who plays again host, following the success of last year’s inaugural event at this epic venue. Consistent snowfall and varied terrain make this world-class resort an ideal test for freeride fanatics.The judging criteria at the Freeride World Tour are: Difficulty of Line, Control, Fluidity, Jumps & Technique.

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2024 #2
programme.desc: La Pierra Menta est devenue au fil des 37 éditions, la compétition de ski-alpinisme de référence, un passage obligé pour l’élite de la discipline. Elle rassemble tous les ans plus de 200 cordées de 2 skieurs. Coup double pour les équipes masculines et féminines françaises qui lemportent dans cette deuxième étape et prennent la tête du classement général à la mi-course

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2024 #1
programme.desc: La Pierra Menta est devenue au fil des 37 éditions, la compétition de ski-alpinisme de référence, un passage obligé pour l’élite de la discipline. Elle rassemble tous les ans plus de 200 cordées de 2 skieurs. Les français brillent lors de cette première étape de la Pierra Menta Axelle Gachet-Mollaret et Emily Harrop entête, William Bonmardion et Xavier Gachet à laffût. des résultats prometteurs pour la suite de la compétition

programme.title: The First Second - Vivian Bruchez
programme.desc: Ses yeux ne quittent jamais la montagne… Du premier coup d’oeil sur une face à la vision exigeante qui englobera tout, Vivian Bruchez avance comme un explorateur. Sa pratique de la pente raide est une marche vers l’inconnu, aussi enthousiaste que méthodique , une quête minutieuse du moindre détail, un parcours vers l‘accord avec lui-même.Vivian Bruchez - The Steep search. His eyes never leave the mountain ... From the first glance at a demanding vision that will encompass everything, Vivian Bruchez moves forward like an explorer. His practice of the steep slope is a march towards the unknown, as enthusiastic as it is methodical, a meticulous quest for the smallest detail, a journey towards agreement with himself.

programme.title: La Grande Odyssée 2022
programme.desc: La Grande Odyssée Savoie Mont Blanc est, depuis sa première édition en janvier 2005, l’événement annuel du chien de traîneau en Europe. C’est la course à étapes la plus exigeante dans un décor alpin unique au monde. Découvrez un plateau sportif d’exception avec 68 mushers et leurs 600 chiens-athlètes venant de grandes nations du mushing européen (France, Suède, Suisse, Espagne, Allemagne, Italie et Pologne). Ce sont plus de 50 000 spectateurs qui vivent chaque année une expérience unique, au coeur de 20 stations, villes et villages, de Savoie Mont Blanc en habits de fête pour l’occasion, en assistant à La Grande Odyssée Savoie Mont Blanc.La Grande Odyssee Savoie Mont Blanc is since it’s first edition in January 2005, the annual event of the dog sled race in Europe. It is the most demanding stage race in a unique alpine setting in the world. Each year it brings together more than 60 mushers and their 600 dogs, from all over Europe, in the stunning landscapes of Savoie Mont Blanc. It is more than 50 000 spectators who live every year a unique experience, in 20 stations decorated for the occasion, by attending La Grande Odyssee Savoie Mont Blanc.

programme.title: Alone And Without A Guide On Mexico's Third Highest Mountain-Iztaccihuatl (Eng)
programme.desc: Being alone and without a guide in a summit attempt for the third highest mountain in Mexico was a dream. The climb is amazing. The ridge to Iztaccihuatls summit feels endless, but the views of the surrounding valleys and Popocatepetl make the effort worth it.

programme.title: The First Second - Sam Anthamatten I
programme.desc: A specialist in high mountains, Sam is a committed freerider, but behind his instinct to ski, there is a guide: it is his job, his culture. At each line, an internal struggle begins between security and risk-taking ... The balance is difficult, with great freedom involved. Through his practice, he lives and perpetuates a mythical image, that of the Zermatt guide.

programme.title: Nightmare Climbs - Jafferau (Eng)
programme.desc: Patrick Martini and his special guests are ready to climb a new, very tough peak: it is the ascent of Jafferau, in Bardonecchia, where Chris Froome won a legendary Pink Jersey in 2018.

programme.title: Engadin Ski Marathon 2023
programme.desc: On Sunday, March 12, 2023, more than 14,000 athletes competed in the 53rd edition of the Engadin Skimarathon, the second largest cross-country skiing event in the world and the largest cross-country skiing event in Switzerland. Among the large crowd of participants are also world-class runners. What awaits them on this day in the high valley are 42 strenuous kilometers over frozen lakes, past typical Engadine villages and through a picturesque Swiss Alpine landscape. The best completed the course in a time of around 1.5 hours.

programme.title: World Rookie Snowboard Finals 2024
programme.desc: The World Rookie Snowboard Finals are an iconic event in the world of youth snowboarding, where emerging athletes have the chance to test themselves and compete against the best in their category becoming a star! The Finals are back in style at the historic location of Kitzsteinhorn Zell am See-Kaprun, for a six-day contest and non-stop activities, providing an exceptional setting and unparalleled snow conditions for this high-level competition. This prestigious event determines the new 2024 World Rookie Champions title for Snowboard Halfpipe and Slopestyle, who earn the opportunity to participate in renowned international competitions and training camps in 2024.

programme.title: Adamello Ultra Trail 2023 - 100 km
programme.desc: The Adamello Trail is a race of 100 km of length and 6.050m of positive difference in altitude, to run in self-sufficiency, organized by the Adamello Ultratrail ASD in cooperation with the Unione dei comuni Alta Valle Camonica. The maximum time allowed to finish the race is 31 hours.

programme.title: The First Second - Laetitia Roux E
programme.desc: Championne française la plus titrée de tous les temps, Laetitia Roux a une capacité quasi-irréelle à aller au bout de la difficulté, dans un des sports les plus durs qui soient… . Son entraînement, omniprésent, reste une école permanente de vie. Son esprit de compétition naturel s’oriente de plus en plus vers l’équipe et le partage. Avec le ski-alpinisme, elle voit le monde comme elle l’aime : élevé, lumineux, rapide. Elle est dans le plaisir.

programme.title: Inside UTMB 2022
programme.desc: UTMB is considered the super bowl of trail running, and with over 10,000 metres of elevation gain, its widely considered to also be one of the most difficult races in the world. This year, Audrée and Jeff would both have the chance to toe the starting line, and this film will show you both of their perspectives with an intimate look at this incredible event.

programme.title: Ungrounded Episode 3 - Meredith Edwards
programme.desc: Meredith Edwards is an elite-level mountain ultra runner, with podium finishes at the Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc TDS race, the Javelina Jundred 100K and the Flagstaff Skyrace 55K. She is also a member of the U.S. Ski Mountaineering Team. In Episode 3, she reveals how in 2019 she fought an inner struggle with her body that almost resulted in a full blood transfusion-and came back from it to win one of the world’s most challenging Ultra Marathons. (English version with French, German, Italian and Spanish subtitles available)

programme.title: Golden Trail Series - Chasing Dreams Season 2022 - Episode 2 A new life (Eng)
programme.desc: From zero-to-hero, this is what happened to rookie Sara Alonso after the first race of the season. See her life change as she rises through the ranks to chase her dream of being amongst the world’s best. Japan’s most famous trail runner, Ruy Ueda, after having a bad start to the season, will try to adjust his racing strategy to get some points at the Mont-Blanc Marathon. Will it work?

programme.title: Golden Trail Series - Chasing Dreams 2023 - Ep 6 The Final - Part 1 (Eng)
programme.desc: The Golden Trail Series grand final unfolds in Italy with a high-speed 8km prologue on day one. Athletes sprint solo, but Rémi Bonnets decisions might risk his entire season. Meanwhile, the intense rivalry between Sophia and Judith on the womens side is on the brink.

programme.title: Super League Triathlon Arena Games 2023 Sursee part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sursee Switzerland for the second race of the 2023 Arena Games Triathlon powered by Zwift and the first journey into Europe for the year. Super League Triathlon which is partnered with World Triathlon brings you the second ever Arena Games Triathlon World Championships, with a champion to be crowned at the final in London after the first two races of the series in Montreal and Sursee.

programme.title: Racing Georgia - Ep 7 (Eng)
programme.desc: Athletes are on the final stage of a 7-day stage race in the country of Georgia with Racing the Planet as they take their final steps to the cave city of Varzdia after running 250 km while carrying all of their food and supplies for the week on their backs.

programme.title: Olympus Marathon 2022 (Eng)
programme.desc: The Olympus Marathon has firmly established itself among the trail running community and it’s 18 years that it’s grown into the epic event it is. In 2022 runners from 25 countries arrived in Greece ready to test themselves in the mountain that is branded a National Park.

programme.title: World Triathlon Para Series 2023
programme.desc: Following its successful debut last year, the World Triathlon Para Series returns to Swansea and a chance for the worlds most decorated para triathletes to put on a show. Among the stars here is Jetze Plat from the Netherlands, unbeaten since 2016, World and Paralympic champion Spain’s Susana Rodriguez, Martin Schultz, the champion in Rio, and Tokyo Alexis Hanquinquant the giant from France, Grace Norman from the United States and from England, the World and Commonwealth champion Dave Ellis.

programme.title: Golden Trail World Series 2023 - Dolomyths Run (Eng)
programme.desc: After the first two exceptional legs, the Golden Trail World Series heads to Canazei, Italy and the thrilling DoloMyths Run. For its 25th anniversary the Italian classic is the 3rd leg of the GTWS 2023. Whos gonna survive to the Couloir of Hell? The race is the most technical one of the GTWS so here we will see all the runners that are specialists in technicall terrain and downhills. It is the last chance for them to score big points before the final.

programme.title: Expedition Canada Season 2 Ep 1 (Eng)
programme.desc: Connecting remote wilderness areas throughout the Okanagan backcountry to string together another world class expedition race is what these ladies, Nathalie Long of Kelowna and Lyndie Hill live for, so long as neither of them get lost in the process. Episode 1 : Finding the Start. Nathalie Long and Lyndie are at it again trying to link up 5 remote areas in the Okanagan backwoods to string together another world class race and not lose anyone in the process.

programme.title: Nepal - The Other Side of Things
programme.desc: A unique spiritual voyage among the giant Himalayan mountains of Everest and Annapurna along ancient paths and across rivers, capturing the local beliefs to discover the marvels of an ancient mountain people in order to understand the meaning of self.

programme.title: Road To One Water Race Ep3 - Swimming
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 7 mixed teams of 7 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness. Road to One Water Race Ep3 describes what is involved in swimming 50 km during the day and during the night in between Islands..

programme.title: Twenty-one Twelve
programme.desc: Katie Visco challenges herself to complete a first ever bike supported 2,112 mile run across Australia and documents all the fun and grueling moments in a first release of Twenty One Twelve. The epic adventure starts in Darwin and ends in Adelaide, 119 days later……

programme.title: Rwanda Congo Uganda Bike Adventure - Part 4
programme.desc: Our friend, bikepacker and adventurer, Michele continues his epic 800km solo African bike packing adventure in Rwanda, through Congo and finishing in Uganda. Part 4 of 4 - The final stage : from Rwanda to Uganda. Michele makes a stop at Lake Mutanda and then visits Queen Elisabeth National Park. Lots of wildlife watching (birds, elephants, buffalos, monkeys, antilopes, hippos, crocodiles...)

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 5
programme.desc: We start our episode from Spain and a renowned Triathlon event in Portocolom, Mallorca. We then stay in Mallorca and we will now follow a cycling one. The 13th edition of the Mallorca 312 OK Mobility. We then leave Mallorca, but stay in Spain for another cycling event, the 13th edition of the Andalucia Bike Race. Then time to move to the new sport’s concept, that bridges the gap between traditional endurance and functional fitness and combines running with well-known gym exercises in a standardized format. Later on we follow the UltraSwim 33.3 event which has the iconic challenge of the English Channel as its inspiration and the event will test swimmers in the equivalent distance of 33.3km, spread over four days and six swims.

programme.title: The Best Hike In Switzerland - Zermatt to Mettelhorn (Eng)
programme.desc: Mettelhorn and Platthorn are hidden gems as a one-day out-and-back hiking/mountaineering trip from Zermatt. Its a good route to help acclimatise to bigger mountains in the area. The route starts from the northern outskirts of Zermatt, Switzerlands picturesque ski resort town, taking paths that zig-zag up the mountain and take you to some stunning Alpine views of famous mountains like the Matterhorn, Zinalrothorn, and Weisshorn. The journey to Mettelhorn was a unique Alpine experience that doesnt pack the same effort punch that lies in most Mountaineering routes while still delivering spectacular mountain views

programme.title: Raid Temiscamingue (Eng)
programme.desc: 24 enthusiasts, 12 families, 1 winning team. The challenge is real, and they are all ready for blood, sweat and tears. The very first RAID Temiscamingue has arrived in one of the most beautiful areas of Canada. Surrounded by mountains, majestic lakes, rivers and luxurious forest, 12 teams will race against the clock in this wild adventure where they’ll have to upscale their skills in paddling, swimming, hiking and biking. They will have to overcome their fear of ziplines and find their way to the finish line through self-orientation with a map. Who is the most adventurous family in the province of Quebec? This is what it is all about.

programme.title: Georgia on my bike - Part 1 (Eng)
programme.desc: Il primo episodio del favoloso giro in bicicletta di Mike Sanna attraverso le montagne del Caucasus in Georgia, a partire dallantica chiesa della Trinità nel nord del paese a Gergeti e attraverso Kazbegi, dirigendosi a sud attraverso il selvaggio e bellissimo entroterra georgianoThe first episode of Mike Sannas fabulous bike packing ride through the Caucasus mountains of Georgia starting with the ancient church of the Trinity in the north of the country in Gergeti, and through Kazbegi, heading south through the wild and beautiful Georgian outback

programme.title: Malawi Bike Tour Part 3
programme.desc: Il nostro amico bikepacker e avventuriero Michele è in viaggio di 4 settimane e 1400 km attraverso la savana, le montagne e le foreste del Malawi. Fantastica avventura africana, paesaggi meravigliosi, grandi incontri umani, fauna selvatica. Parte 3 di Liwonde N.P. a Blantyre.Our friend bikepacker and adventurer Michele is on a 4 weeks and 1400 km bike trip through savanna, mountains and forests in Malawi. Fantastic African adventure, gorgeous scenery, great human encounters, wildlife. Part 3 from Liwonde N.P. to Blantyre.

programme.title: A Feather in the West
programme.desc: In September 2019, a team of talented Irish climbers [Chloe Condron, Kevin Kilroy, Michelle OLoughlin and Conor McGovern] travelled to the small island of Owey to explore sea cliffs that local guidebook writer Iain Miller claims, have “enough new routing potential to last at least twelve lifetimes”. ‘A Feather in the West’ is a film about their trad climbing experiences and the relatively niche pursuit of first ascents, set on the Wild Atlantic Way, off the west coast of County Donegal. (Special thanks to Pertex)

programme.title: Ungrounded Episode 4 - Sunny Stroeer
programme.desc: Two weeks after paying off her student loans, Sunny Stroeer left her job as a strategy consultant, moved into her astro van, and began running and climbing full time. Since then, she has gone to break records and climb summits no woman has done before. In Episode 4 of Ungrounded, Stroeer shares how she pushed herself to tackle some of the world’s highest peaks.(English version with French, German, Italian and Spanish subtitles available)

programme.title: Rwanda Congo Uganda Bike Adventure - Part 3
programme.desc: Our friend, bikepacker and adventurer, Michele continues his epic 800km solo African bike packing adventure in Rwanda, through Congo and finishing in Uganda. Part 3 of 4 - Republic Democratic of Congo : Gorillas and Volcanoes. Michele left his bicycle for a few days to go to Congo to visit the Virunga National Park. Here he could see the famous mountain gorillas and get to the top of Nyiragongo Volcano (3740m) where he spend the night to admire the lava lake. he also had to be careful and avoid the Ebola pandemia.

programme.title: The Outdoor Sports Show 2023 - Episode 10
programme.desc: In this episode, we dive headfirst into the waters of Europe and Spain, where the final ICF Canoe Slalom and Kayak Cross World Cup unfolded in La Seu. Next, we embark on an epic journey to Andorra for the DynaFit Andorra SkiMo, a long-distance ski mountaineering experience that has become a must-not-miss event. This 70km route connects ten mountain refuges, providing an unforgettable adventure. Our quest for thrills takes us across continents and landscapes as we explore World Trail Races, a platform dedicated to promoting mountain culture throughout Brazil. Here, trail running and mountain biking enthusiasts answer the call of the mountains. The FEI, the International Federation for Equestrian Sports, showcases elite athletes competing in renowned competitions worldwide. Athletes from around the globe are tested to their limits in the world of equestrian sports. The 31st FISU Summer World University Games, held in Chengdu, delivered thrilling spectacles across various sports. But the excitement doesnt stop there. We infuse our show with the high-energy spirit of HYROX, where we witness the evolution of this exciting concept and get to enjoy elite competitors in action.

programme.title: Marathon Des Sables 2023 #2
programme.desc: Marathon Des Sables 2023 Day 2. 1,054 competitors embarked on the day’s 31.7 K course, which includes the magnificent, yet demanding, sandy climb of the EL OTFAL djebel. The stage took place under a scorching heat. On the MDS, the second stage is always crucial: it’s make-or-break !Marathon Des Sables 2023 Jour 2. 1054 concurrents se sont élancés sur les 31,7 km du jour, incluant la magnifique et terrible ascension sablonneuse du djebel EL OTFAL. Le parcours s’est effectué sous une chaleur écrasante. Sur le MDS, la deuxième étape est toujours cruciale : ça passe ou ça casse.

programme.title: Malawi Bike Tour Part 2
programme.desc: Il nostro amico bikepacker e avventuriero Michele è in viaggio di 4 settimane e 1400 km attraverso la savana, le montagne e le foreste del Malawi. Fantastica avventura africana, paesaggi meravigliosi, grandi incontri umani, fauna selvatica. Parte 1 in bicicletta lungo la costa del lago Malawi.Our friend bikepacker and adventurer Michele is on a 4 weeks and 1400 km bike trip through savanna, mountains and forests in Malawi. Fantastic African adventure, gorgeous scenery, great human encounters, wildlife. Part 1 cycling the lake Malawi coastline.

programme.title: Road To One Water Race Ep2 - The Athletes
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 7 mixed teams of 7 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness. Road to One Water Race Ep2 presents the athletes, their motivation and fears.

programme.title: The First Second - Armel Le Cléac'h (VF)
programme.desc: Armel Le Cléac’h construit ses victoires grâce à une relation forte avec toute l’équipe dont il se sent le prolongement… Mais pour ce navigateur engagé dans une lutte dantesque avec l’océan sur un trimaran géant de 32 mètres, chaque trajectoire vers un nouveau départ est une nouvelle confrontation avec l’imprévu, avec sa propre volonté et avec son premier adversaire : lui-même.

programme.title: Road To One Water Race Ep4 - Running
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 7 mixed teams of 7 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness. Road to One Water Race Ep4 describes how tough the running will is through very difficult terrains.

programme.title: ÖTILLÖ Swimrun Engadin 2023
programme.desc: Slightly overcast but warm conditions made for an ideal race day in the beautiful Engadin valley. 450 athletes from 37 nations participated in the three race distances World Series, Sprint and Experience. 70 teams and 45 solo athletes competed in the World Series race, which covered a total distance of 43.4 km up and down the Upper Engadin with start and finish in Silvaplana. The racers had to master 37.5 km of partly very technical trail running and 5.9 km of swimming across 9 swim sections in Lake Silvaplana, Lake Champfèr and Lake Sils.Des conditions légèrement couvertes mais chaudes ont fait une journée de course idéale dans la belle vallée de lEngadine. 450 athlètes de 37 nations ont participé aux trois distances de course World Series, Sprint et Experience. 70 équipes et 45 athlètes en solo ont participé à la course des World Series, qui a parcouru une distance totale de 43,4 km dans la Haute-Engadine avec départ et arrivée à Silvaplana. Les coureurs devaient maîtriser 37,5 km de trail en partie très technique et 5,9 km de natation sur 9 sections de natation dans le lac de Silvaplana, le lac de Champfèr et le lac de Sils.

programme.title: Muscat Classic 2024
programme.desc: The Muscat Classic is a cycling race which takes place as a prelude to the Tour Of Oman on a difficult 174 kilometer route between Al Mouj Muscat and Al Bustan with 6 climbs totaling 2,000 meters of D+.

programme.title: Cro Race 2023 Stage 4
programme.desc: Cro Race 2023 Stage 4 : KRK - LABIN

programme.title: Tour de France Prudential Singapore Criterium
programme.desc: The Tour de France Prudential Singapore Criterium race weekend includes races for both professionals and amateurs. The two-day programme culminates with the criterium race featuring 28 top international riders (Marc Cavendish, Tadej Pogacar, Peter Sagan ...) from 7 of the worlds best professional cycling teams (UAE Emirates, Cofidis, Bahrain Victorious ...)

programme.title: From The South Up - The Film
programme.desc: Brendon Tyree, a photographer and ex elite bicycle racer from Sheffield in the UK is turning one of those old dreams into reality : to ride on his bike the length of South America. His trip starts off at the bottom of the world in Chile’s extreme south, and then ride north through a constantly changing landscape of Glaciers, Deserts and Salt flats followed by the high Andean Mountains and the Amazon Rain Forest before finally finishing up on the Caribbean coast of Colombia.

programme.title: 4Islands 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: 4Islands MTB Croatia, a stage race in the Epic Series (e.g. including the Cape Epic), will welcome over 370 mountain bikers from all over the world for a five-day race on four Croatian islands. This year the order of the islands is slightly different, starting with Krk, Cres, Lošinj and ending the adventure on Rab. The race covers a total of 272 km with 6.210 m of climbing, promising the riders raw beauty and different challenges each day, with some islands offering rugged and barren terrain, while others offer green landscapes.

programme.title: Cycling For Autism (Eng)
programme.desc: Whether it was a need for adventure or to stop a life thats going too fast or to reconnect with the essentials, Adrien did a 6-month cycling tour of Europe in 2022. To make the adventure even more beautiful and intense to experience, it was natural for him to associate it with an important cause, and one that is close to his heart : Autism. Xavier is his 15 year old autistic nephew, and as he loves cycling as much as him, Adrien wanted to help the association “Des Rêves pour Xavier” (Dreams for Xavier) to finance an electric tandem. Adrien’s other goal was to raise autism awareness among as many people as possible.

programme.title: Freewheeling 2023 Ep.2 Strade Bianche (Eng)
programme.desc: Exclusive behind the scenes of the first race of the year - the classic - Strade Bianche 2023 presented by Hannah Walker with a look at mens team Arkea Samsic and womens UAE team ADQ. Hannah discusses the results as well as womens cycling with UAE coach Ruben Bertogliati and with top cyclist Silvia Persico and others.

programme.desc: Saksikan paparan serta kupasan tentang kanser Follicular Lymphoma bersama Dr. Shazril Imran shaukat (Pkar Onkologi dan Radioterapi, Hospital Pantai Sungai Petani) akan menerangkan sisi perubatan dalam segmen bersama pakar. Lakonan : Hafiz Bahari, Adam Shahz, Falisha Crossley, Ayu Raudah dan Wan Nor Azlin.

Lakonan : Chai Xinie, Wilson Lee, Johnathan Lee dan Candy Lee.

programme.title: Katta Bomman
programme.desc: Kisah 2 sahabat yang menyewa di kawasan Kampung dan mempunyai masalah kerana keadaan rumah tersebut yang tidak sesuai dengan kehidupan mereka. Lakonan : K. Gunasegaran, Balaganapathi dan Shanmuganathan.

programme.title: Pembukaan - Negaraku
programme.desc: Lagu Negaraku

programme.title: Seharum Kenanga
programme.desc: Dania, model dan pelakon terkenal berkahwin dengan Omar, seorang arkitek muda yang berjaya. Perkahwinan yang dibina atas dasar cinta sangat bahagia. Mereka dikurniakan dua orang anak di samping perniagaan yang semakin maju. Namun, semuanya berubah selepas Dania terlibat dalam kemalangan yang menyebabkan dia menjadi cacat. Sikap Omar mula berubah dan dia menjadikan alasan isterinya cacat untuk berpoligami. Lakonan : Janet Khoo, Faizal Hussein, Rosnah Johari, Mahyon Ismail, Fadhilah Mansor, Shahruddin Thamby dan Nabila Nur Naquiyah.

programme.title: Vincent & Friends

programme.title: Biskut Lemak
programme.desc: Animasi tentang penduduk kampung dengan pelbagai ragam dan kisah menarik.

programme.title: Paksi Adiwira
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Jaguh, pemuda yang hidup pada zaman kegemilangan Kesultanan Melayu Melaka. Jaguh dibesarkan oleh Tok Guru yang memperkenalkannya dengan dunia persilatan.

programme.title: Nadim
programme.desc: Kisah Nadim, kanak-kanak yang cintakan ilmu pengetahuan, berkongsi pengalamannya melawat tempat-tempat menarik dalam negara. Nadim juga menyelesaikan masalah yang dihadapinya dengan bijak.

programme.title: Janji Diana
programme.desc: Diana seorang gadis bermasalah yang menyalahkan bapanya diatas kematian ibunya dan memusuhi ibu tirinya, Anita. Dia juga mempunyai masalah mempercayai lelaki sehinggalah dia bertemu dengan Haikal seorang jejaka yang tidak percaya pada perempuan setelah mendapati bahawa tunangnya sendiri telah berlaku curang terhadapnya. Setelah mereka berdua mula jatuh cinta dan hampir mempercayai diri masing-masing, muncul pula Sabrina bekas tunang Haikal cuba untuk memisahkan mereka berdua. Lakonan : Aaron Aziz, Sheera Iskandar, Diana Danielle, Iqram Dinzly, Lando dan Datuk Jalaluddin Hassan.

programme.title: Jom Shoppe (Laundreze 1)
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan membeli-belah melalui talian khas untuk anda.

programme.title: Khabar Dari Casablanca
programme.desc: Kisah kehidupan romantis sepasang suami isteri yang bekerja di luar negara. Akibat satu insiden, suaminya tidak dapat dikesan dan ramai percaya yang dia telah meninggal dunia. Si isteri yakin bahawa suaminya masih hidup dan terus menghantar emel kepada suaminya yang telah ‘mati’. Dia dituduh tidak siuman lalu dimasukkan ke pusat psikiatri. Lakonan : Remy Ishak, Uqasha Senrose, Sasqia Dahuri, Disha dan Riz Amin.

programme.title: Berita Mandarin
programme.desc: Ikuti berita berbahasa Mandarin yang memaparkan perkembangan politik, sosial, ekonomi, sukan, hiburan dan isu-isu semasa.

programme.title: Galeri Mandarin
programme.desc: Rancangan berbentuk majalah berbahasa Mandarin yang memaparkan aktiviti dan kegiatan semasa masyarakat.

programme.title: World Today
programme.desc: World Today, brings you the latest news of national interest and trending international issues.

programme.title: Cinta Yang Pulang
programme.desc: Noah dan Adina bersahabat baik. Mereka tinggal berjiran dan belajar di kolej yang sama. Adina adalah seorang yang kelam kabut dan mudah panik. Noah sering mengejek dan membuli Adina. Di kolej Noah mempunyai seorang kekasih bernama Thia. Cemburu melihat keakraban antara Noah dan Adina, Thia telah memfitnah Adina dan menuduh dia menyebarkan gambar kurang sopan Thia. Lakonan : Umi Nazeera dan Izzue Islam.

programme.title: Bara Yang Ku Genggam
programme.desc: Kehidupan Juwita yang bahagia setelah mendirikan rumah tangga dengan lelaki pilihannya, Adli berubah setelah mereka terlibat dalam kemalangan yang tanpa diduga telah meragut nyawa suaminya itu. Namun Juwita hanya diberitahu kematian suaminya setelah selamat melahirkan anak sulongnya, Aiman. Daripada wanita ’biasa-biasa’ yang bergelar suri rumah, Juwita bangkit semula daripada trauma episod sedih kehilangan suaminya kerana sedar dia masih perlu membesarkan Aiman dengan penuh kasih sayang. Lakonan : Rozita Che Wan, Ako Mustafa, Shahrizal Jaafar, Dian P.Ramlee, Catriona Ross, Zack Idris, Memey Suhaiza, Fezrul Khan dan Jasmin Ashraf.

programme.title: Lawless Love
programme.desc: Kisah cinta 2 darjat antara Davut yang bekerja sebagai pekerja di lombong arang batu dan Gulfem yang merupakan anak kepada pemilik lombong tersebut. Davut, seorang anak muda yang hidup sederhana tinggal dengan adik-beradik dan ibu bapanya. Dia bekerja sebagai buruh di sebuah lombong arang batu bersama bapa dan adik-adik lelakinya. Dia seorang yang berani dan amat bencikan ketidakadilan. Suatu hari, berlaku tragedi di lombong arang batu akibat pengabaian oleh pemilik lombong dan tragedi itu membuatkan ramai pekerja terbunuh termasuk bapa Davut. Maka bermulalah perjuangan Davut menentang pemilik lombong yang tamak dan kejam terhadap pekerja-pekerjanya. Lakonan : Ugur Günes, Esra Bilgic, Kaan Tasaner, Mine Teber dan Dogac Yildiz.

programme.title: Ngat & Taboh
programme.desc: Animasi bersiri yang mengisahkan Ngat, lebah bijak yang sering menyakat rakan-rakannya terutamanya Taboh seekor beruang.

programme.title: Bijaknya Max!
programme.desc: Max yang secara tidak sengaja telah melancarkan kapal angkasa di pengkalan angkasa Profesor Talib dan tiba ke ruang angkasa. Max mendapat pertolongan daripada Ceria dan Rover yang keduanya berasal dari planet berbeza. Mereka bertiga bersahabat dan berjanji untuk mengembara bersama dan saling mengenali antara satu sama lain. Sebelum kembali ke pengkalan angkasa di bumi, mereka perlu menghadapi pelbagai cabaran mengenai sains dan teknologi terlebih dahulu. Kebijaksanaan Max terbatas dan memerlukan pertolongan rakan-rakannya dalam menyelesaikan misi tersebut.

programme.title: Berita Mandarin
programme.desc: Berita berbahasa Mandarin yang memaparkan perkembangan politik, sosial, ekonomi, sukan, hiburan dan isu-isu semasa.

programme.title: Berita Tamil
programme.desc: Berita berbahasa Tamil yang memaparkan perkembangan politik, sosial, ekonomi, sukan, hiburan dan isu-isu semasa.

programme.title: Mrs. Vip
programme.desc: Mrs. Vip mengisahkan seorang perempuan yang dikurung oleh ibu angkatnya, Ratna dari bergaul dan melihat dunia luar. Hidup gadis bernama Jasmine berubah selepas berkenalan dengan seorang lelaki bernama Khairul yang telah membawanya ke dunia luar dan merubah hidupnya sehingga terbongkar segala rahsia yang tersimpan rapi oleh ibu angkatnya selama ini. Lakonan : Ikhram Juhari ,Janicca Mae ,Zeera Azizi ,Kuna dan Clarice John Matha.\n

programme.title: Apa Cerita Gai?
programme.desc: Kisah 3 rakan, Nina, Val dan Kimi yang tinggal bersama. Kehidupan mereka mula huru-hara apabila Auntie Gai, mak cik kepada Nina yang mencari tempat tinggal selepas rumahnya dijual dan menumpang rumah sewa mereka. Lakonan : Nia Natalia, Marisa Yasmin, Malanie Tan dan Jasper Supayah.

programme.title: Dia…Legenda Unplugged
programme.desc: Mini konsert bersama barisan artis veteran / legenda popular. Selain menyanyikan lagu-lagu popular mereka secara unplugged, tetamu jemputan turut berkongsi pengalaman suka dan duka sepanjang berkecimpung dalam industri muzik tanah air. Artis jemputan dalam episod kali adalah Dato' Khadijah Ibrahim.

programme.title: Oh My Netizen
programme.desc: Halim panik apabila mendapati anaknya, Mia dan isterinya, Laila tiada di rumah ketika pulang dari kerja. Dia mengesyaki mereka telah diculik kerana dia gagal menghubungi isterinya. Kehilangan kedua-dua insan ini juga telah menimbulkan keresahan di kalangan masyarakat sekeliling setelah Halim turut melaporkan kejadian tersebut di media sosial untuk menjejaki anak dan isterinya itu. Lakonan : Rosnah Mat Aris, Mimi Eenida, Ayu Azlina dan Jeff Hasan.

programme.title: Since I Found You
programme.desc: Nathan Capistrano, seorang ahli perniagaan yang berjaya merupakan pengurus syarikat pembinaan terkemuka. Walaupun memiliki karisma dan rupa paras yang menarik, tetapi setiap pekerja takut dengannya kerana sikap tegas dan gaya kepimpinannya. Namun, kehidupannya berubah apabila dia bertemu dengan Dani, seorang pelajar yang sedang menjalani praktikal di syarikatnya. Lakonan : Piolo Pascual, Arci Muñoz dan Jc De Vera.
